entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
